recipeDetails: Heat olive oil in a large pan over medium heat and add chopped onions and garlic. Cook until soft. Add ground beef and cook until browned. Stir in tomato sauce, salt, and pepper, and simmer for 20 minutes. Meanwhile, cook spaghetti according to package instructions. Serve the sauce over the spaghetti and enjoy.
ingredients: Spaghetti, ground beef, tomato sauce, onions, garlic, olive oil, salt, pepper

recipeDetails: Heat oil in a pan over medium heat and add chopped onions, garlic, and ginger. Cook until soft. Add chicken pieces and cook until browned. Stir in curry powder and cook for a minute. Add coconut milk, salt, and pepper, and simmer for 30 minutes until the chicken is cooked through. Serve with rice.
ingredients: Chicken, curry powder, coconut milk, onions, garlic, ginger, salt, pepper

recipeDetails: Heat oil in a pan over medium heat and add ground beef. Cook until browned, then stir in taco seasoning and water. Simmer until thickened. Warm taco shells in the oven. Fill taco shells with beef, lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, and sour cream. Serve with salsa.
ingredients: Ground beef, taco shells, lettuce, tomatoes, cheese, sour cream, salsa, taco seasoning

recipeDetails: Prepare sushi rice according to package instructions. Place a sheet of nori on a bamboo mat, spread a thin layer of rice over the nori, and add your choice of fillings like salmon, tuna, cucumber, and avocado. Roll the sushi tightly and cut into pieces. Serve with soy sauce and wasabi.
ingredients: Sushi rice, nori, salmon, tuna, cucumber, avocado, soy sauce, wasabi

recipeDetails: In a shallow dish, whisk together eggs, milk, cinnamon, and sugar. Dip slices of bread into the mixture, coating both sides. Cook the bread in a buttered skillet over medium heat until golden brown on both sides. Serve with syrup.
ingredients: Bread, eggs, milk, cinnamon, sugar, butter, syrup

recipeDetails: In a large bowl, toss romaine lettuce with Caesar dressing. Add croutons and grated Parmesan cheese. Top with grilled chicken if desired. Serve immediately.
ingredients: Romaine lettuce, croutons, Caesar dressing, Parmesan cheese, chicken

recipeDetails: Soak rice noodles in warm water until soft. Heat oil in a wok and add shrimp and tofu, cooking until browned. Add beaten eggs and cook until scrambled. Add noodles, tamarind paste, fish sauce, and sugar, stirring to combine. Serve with bean sprouts and crushed peanuts.
ingredients: Rice noodles, shrimp, tofu, peanuts, bean sprouts, eggs, tamarind paste, fish sauce, sugar

recipeDetails: In a large bowl, combine chopped tomatoes, cucumbers, olives, and red onions. Add crumbled feta cheese and drizzle with olive oil. Sprinkle with oregano and toss to combine. Serve chilled.
ingredients: Tomatoes, cucumbers, olives, feta cheese, red onions, olive oil, oregano

recipeDetails: Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C). In a bowl, mix flour, sugar, cocoa powder, and baking powder. Add eggs, milk, and melted butter, stirring until smooth. Pour the batter into a greased cake pan and bake for 30-35 minutes. Let cool before frosting with chocolate icing.
ingredients: Flour, sugar, cocoa powder, baking powder, eggs, milk, butter, chocolate

recipeDetails: In a food processor, combine chickpeas, onions, garlic, parsley, cilantro, cumin, and coriander. Pulse until mixture is coarse. Form into small patties and fry in hot oil until golden brown. Serve with pita bread and tahini sauce.
ingredients: Chickpeas, onions, garlic, parsley, cilantro, cumin, coriander, salt, pepper
